posts.post_title: FS: Graves N172 Old Judge - fantastic catcher pose with mask
posts.post_content:
FS: Graves, Catcher, Minneapolis  Old Judge N172

Trimmed on sides and the Goodwin ad at the bottom. Has great contrast, and a great pose. Some sort of photo loss on left arm, no sure what it is. Original back.

$70 postpaid

Contact me here or [url]pbaldes@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Peter Baldes
